name: Battle for Blockchain: Creating an Auto-Battling Mechanism in MUD
description: Originating in the popular mod Dota Auto Chess, the auto-battler mechanic has since gone on to spawn an entire genre of games. This practical session will demonstrate how such a mechanism can be created onchain within the MUD framework.

speakers.name: stokarz
speakers.bio: stokarz is the CEO of Minters and the creator of the onchain strategy game Rhascau.
